report.title: Medicinal Benefits for Me
report.author: Tiamat
report.bodytext: First off, I want to say that Kratom is a miracle plant. /n /n I have been using kratom very regularly for nearly two years now. Sometimes I use Kratom every day. /n /n I have experimented by taking 20 grams crushed leaf EVERY DAY for one month and then quit abruptly. I stayed off the Kratom for one week and found that I had NO physical withdrawal symptoms. /n /n I did have an urge to take Kratom though. The reason for this, I believe, is due to its medicinal qualities, not any addictive properties. /n /n I have suffered with a medium level of depression my whole adult life. Kratom has cured me of my depression and I therefore do not want to discontinue taking my medicine. /n /n Here is a list of the great things that Kratom has done for me: /n /n 1) Kratom makes me more social and thus reduces my use of alcohol to make me more comfortable in social situations. /n /n 2) Kratom eliminates my depression. I only take one dose in the evening and the elimination of my depression lasts 24 hours. /n /n 3) I often suffer from very annoying allergies (hay fever) and Kratom completely eliminates my hay fever. It works much, much better than OTC antihistamines. /n /n 4) Kratom gives me physical energy which often comes in very handy as I am a musician and often have to stay out late and lug around lots of equipment. /n /n The only negative side effect that I have found is that I very occasionally get nausea when I eat while under the influence of Kratom. On the off chance that I do vomit, this act immediately makes me feel 100% better (It is not like alcohol where I keep puking until I dry heave and I still feel sick)
